bio:
Simba is the Head of Service & Delivery at Broker Tools, overseeing the humans timelines, cadence, and documentation (with the occasional nap, usually had during important meetings). Known for his strict walk-time schedule — and even stricter treat compliance — Simba ensures work gets finished because his time is precious. 

While he doesn’t understand what a CRM does (that’s his mother’s job), he does understand that without enforced play, walk, and rest schedules, everything quickly goes off the rails. His role is simple: to balance work with play.
name: Simba — Head of Service & Delivery

children.text: Why Choosing the Right CRM Matters More Than Ever

The Australian mortgage and finance landscape has become significantly more complex over the past five years. Between BID (Best Interests Duty), stricter compliance obligations, larger client expectations, and aggregator-specific workflows, brokers are juggling more apps and admin than ever.

A CRM isn’t just a database anymore — it’s the backbone of your brokerage.
The right system reduces admin time, improves compliance, and helps you convert more leads with less manual effort.
A poor choice, however, creates bottlenecks, double data entry, and lost opportunities.
Before comparing CRMs, map your brokerage workflow. Most brokers underestimate how many moving pieces they actually handle.
Capturing leads from websites, referrals, real estate partners, social media
A good CRM should make it easy to move a client through:
If a CRM can’t support your full workflow, you’ll feel it immediately.
Step 2: Identify Your Non-Negotiable CRM Features
Every brokerage has different needs, but these are the core features most Australian brokers require:
Pipeline stages that match your process
with your aggregator and tools you already use
If the CRM ticks these boxes, you’re in a strong starting position.
Step 3: Consider Local Australian Support & Integrations
A CRM might look impressive, but Australian brokers face unique requirements.
Does the CRM integrate with major Australian aggregators?
Are templates and pipelines designed for Aussie lending?
Do they push automatic updates for lender policies?
Do they understand compliance expectations from MFAA or FBAA?
A CRM built for generic sales teams almost always falls short here.
Step 4: Compare the Leading CRMs for Australian Brokers
Not suitable for brokers outside supported groups
Great process optimisation and task automation
Not a traditional CRM (pairs best with something like HubSpot/Pipedrive)
This is where modern brokerages win.
The more automation you set up early, the more scalable your brokerage becomes.
A CRM must grow with you.
Take one real client from “new lead” to “settlement”.
Time how long each step takes.
See how much manual admin is left.
Ask your team how intuitive it feels.
Measure how quickly you can find loan notes, emails, tasks, and compliance docs.
If you feel friction during the test, you’ll feel it even more when your volume increases.
Here’s a simple checklist to confirm a CRM is a good fit:
Automates at least 50% of admin tasks
Easy for new staff to learn
Offers good pricing as your team grows
Makes your brokerage feel faster, not slower
If a CRM ticks the majority of these boxes, it’s likely the right choice for your brokerage.

summary: A comparison of the top CRM platforms brokers rely on in 2025: Salestrekker, Pipedrive, HubSpot, and Monday.com.
title: The Best CRMs for Mortgage Brokers in Australia (2025 Edition)

description: MBJ Technologies is an Australian-based technology services company specialising in managed IT, cybersecurity, cloud solutions, and business systems support. They help growing businesses stay secure, connected, and productive with tailored IT strategies, proactive monitoring, and responsive support. From networking and data protection to Microsoft 365 and cloud infrastructure, MBJ Technologies partners with organisations to streamline technology, reduce risk, and support scalable growth with reliable, people-first service.
editorNotes: One of the most responsive and reliable IT Support teams we've worked. The coolest thing part of working alongside them is how passionate Mitch and the team are about ensuring Brokers don't pay for extra tools especially as Microsoft has bunch of *free* inbuilt tools such as Bookings (Calendly alternative) , Power Automate (Zapier alternative) and Planner (Trello alternative)
name: MBJ Tech
tagline: IT support you can count on

description: Broker Tools provides mortgage, asset, and commercial brokers a way to discover software, services, and AI automations to scale faster with less time.
editorNotes: OH -- This is us! Are we allowed to be bias in our opinions? I don't know. But I will tell you this, we built Broker Tools because we saw the gaps and thought we could glue those things together. No matter what software or service provider you use, there is always a GAP something they don't do, say or offer and so that's our jam -- automating, optimising and streamlining the way you work. Are we the best at what we do? Probably not - but we are the most knowledgable in what software, services and integrations are available to Mortgage, Asset and Commercial brokers.
name: Broker Tools

description: Huon IT is an IT support, cybersecurity, cloud, and digital transformation solutions provider based in Australia backed by a globally recognised company. They work with mid-market and enterprise organisations to modernise infrastructure, protect data, and improve operational performance. With a strong focus on security, compliance, and strategic IT advisory, Huon IT partners with businesses to build resilient, scalable technology environments that support long-term growth.
editorNotes: Perfect for a mid-size Broker organisation, they have a great range of education and services. We discovered their services via friend and while we didn't choose to work alongside them for that project. They were very friendly and clear on what they can offer the Broker community.
name: Huon IT

description: Crisp Communications & Marketing helps businesses sharpen their brand voice, build authority, and drive engagement through strategic marketing, PR, and communication frameworks designed for long-term brand equity.
editorNotes: When building a social media or organic leads process needs more than throwing spaghetti at the wall and seeing what sticks methodology -- Crisp Marketing is who we partner with. They provide the documentation and strategy for your marketing processes and we find Abi's style very calming.
name: Crisp Communications & Marketing

description: Promptli delivers fast, accurate credit assessments and loan-deal processing for mortgage brokers. Their expert credit analysts turn deals and borrower documents into full assessment reports, helping brokers scale capacity and close deals faster without adding headcount
editorNotes: A client of ours used them for when they were a little stretched but didin't want to hire a VA. If you need a loan processing service ad hoc they are your outsourcing team.
features: Backed by the team at Quickli
name: Promptli

description: Bolder Digital build automations that manages customer conversations and books appointments across multiple channels without human involvement, streamlining the entire customer interaction process.
editorNotes: The Bolder Digital team really understand all things sales and real world marketing. They have honed their GHL niche services in AI Agents and digital marketing services.
name: BolderDigital

description: Milex is a technology services provider based in Sydney, delivering managed IT, cybersecurity, cloud infrastructure, and business systems support. They help organisations simplify technology, strengthen security, and scale with confidence through proactive support, tailored solutions, and strategic IT advisory. Milex partners with growing businesses to improve performance, reduce risk, and future-proof operations with reliable, high-impact technology.
editorNotes: Recommended by a broker contact, the Milex Technology team are happy and keen to help you wherever they can. Could easily chat Cybersecurity and IT support all day with them - but as a Broker you just need to know they care about the service they provide you
name: Milex Technology
tagline: IT that works as hard as you do

description: IT Zen is an IT and cybersecurity provider focused on creating calm, secure, and high-performing technology environments for modern businesses. Based in Launceston, they deliver tailored IT support, cloud solutions, cybersecurity, and proactive monitoring to reduce noise, prevent downtime, and improve productivity around Australia. With a people-first approach and a focus on simplicity, IT Zen helps organisations stay balanced, protected, and confidently supported as they grow.
editorNotes: The IT support team behind Evolved Podcast Academy (more specifically Victor) they helped set up the Laptops the offshore and local team use.
name: IT Zen
tagline: Calm, secure technology for modern business

description: Fusemate provides businesses with a certified white label marketing team that increases capacity, skill sets and profit without the headache of finding expensive full-time staff. Flat-rate, Go High Level Support for creative & development tasks. Specialized full time Go High Level Virtual Assistants
editorNotes: When it comes to anything Go High Level, the Fusemate team are our support crew. Beyond being great at GHL as a service, they offer a pod of collaborators who can manage graphic design, social media, landing page design, video editing and website management.
name: FuseMate
tagline: Reliable. Profitable. Scalable Go High Level & website Support.

description: Learn Awesome helps companies and experts create interactive, engaging, and memorable learning experiences that drive long-term customer retention and activate thriving local communities.
editorNotes: If you are looking to increase Client Retention through real world, practical action steps - Steve and the Learn Awesome team are for you. He doesn't do fluffy "I believe in the 'universe', law of attraction and manifestation" type client retention work. Because truth be told - that's not a repeatable, mappable process, grounded in visible data.
name: Learn Awesome
tagline: Help you become a local community hero

description: Vahler Media is a results-driven digital marketing agency specialising in paid media, funnels, and growth campaigns for service-based and online businesses. They focus on data-backed strategies that turn traffic into measurable revenue—not vanity metrics.
editorNotes: If someone comes to us for a Paid Ads campaign enquiry, Vahler Media (Charley) is the first person we reach out to. The openness in their service metrics (without giving away the secret sauce) is what we love about the Vahler Media team
name: Vahler Media

description: B2B School is an education platform for consultants, agencies, and B2B service providers looking to systemise their business, sharpen their offers, and scale profitably with repeatable growth frameworks.
editorNotes: If figuring out how to do low effort marketing is your gig, James Tuckerman & JohnnyE are your best guides. We have worked on other projects in the past and thoroughly enjoy the laziness of content creation with them. Because you don't need special equipment or expensive start points just a simple process to follow
name: B2B School
tagline: Build authority. Collect Leads. Close Faster

description: Marketing Results delivers accountability-first digital marketing for Australian businesses, combining SEO, Google Ads, conversion optimisation, and strategy to drive sustainable, long-term growth with transparent ROI.
editorNotes: Marketing Results is the team that help co-create Broker Engine. Their communication and service delivery is top notch. We have enjoyed working alongside them in the past.
name: Marketing Results

description: ProNarrative helps brands craft powerful messaging, positioning, and thought-leadership content that connects with audiences and drives action. They specialise in strategic storytelling for founders, experts, and purpose-led businesses.
editorNotes: ProNarrative, while technically a new service - we have known Ben through other projects we have collaborated on and love he builds lead generation services using KLT (Know, List and Trust) systems.
name: ProNarrative
tagline: Where your story becomes your strategy.

description: Emily Diamond Coaching supports founders and business owners to scale sustainably through mindset, leadership development, and strategic alignment—bridging performance with personal evolution.
editorNotes: Mindset is a huge aspect on achieving what you want in business and in life. I have been fortunate enough to have worked alongside some cool people in Hypnotherapy and NeuroLingusitic Programming - however Emily's Instant Change Belief process would be the most effective technique I've used to move through issues/stuckness quickly
name: Emily Diamond Coaching
tagline: Build the business. Become the leader.

description: Impactful Presenters trains leaders, founders, and professionals to communicate with clarity, confidence, and influence—whether on stage, on camera, in meetings, or online.
editorNotes: Impactful Presenters - Cat Matson in particular - has been an amazing guide on how to stand in your truth and speak. Whether your a building a verbal brand message for your team or an internal framework for how you communicate the work you do. Doing a workshop in person or online with Cat is one of the best experiences we've had.
name: Impactful Presenters
tagline: Speak with confidence. Lead with impact.

description: Penhaligon Applied Psychology helps high performers stop overthinking, procrastinating, and stressing themselves out using practical psychology methods that reduce burn-out and unlock peak performance.
editorNotes: We were scrolling through LinkedIn when we saw a friend commenting on Bronwyn's post about Broker burnout. As we at Broker Tools care deeply about the mental health and well being of others, know that having a Psychologist who can help you navigate Broker anxiety and goals stress is important. So if that's you - reach out and get help.
name: Penhaligon Applied Psychology

description: Auctus Coaching works with founders and teams to unlock sustainable growth through leadership development, performance coaching, and high-trust organisational strategy
editorNotes: If you want to optimise your aggregator tool stack and build your Broker support team, Auctus Coaching is your F1 crew. Christian and the team love building systems and processes -- and finding virtual assistants to help manage it. They are our go to collaboration and broker knowledge partner for Broker Tools.
name: Auctus Coaching
tagline: Growth, built from the inside out

description: Broker Coach provides specialist coaching for mortgage brokers focused on business structure, time leverage, leadership, and predictable growth—without sacrificing lifestyle.
editorNotes: Want an energy injection into your broker business? Sam is the perfect Broker Coach for you he likes the world of content marketing and generating leads. So if you want support growing X-potentially he's the scaling partner for you
name: Broker Coach
tagline: Build a mortgage business that actually scales

description: Systemology helps business owners extract critical processes, build operational playbooks, and scale without chaos—turning founder-dependent businesses into process-driven machines.
editorNotes: We were really lucky to work alongside Dave in the early days of Systemology and saw the CCF (Critical Client Flow) process built in real-time. This experience changed how we document and manage workflow automations going forward. If you want the framework and how to guide for building systems and finding your Systems Champion then systemology is a great service
name: Systemology

description: Proowrx handles loan processing, bookkeeping, accounting and back-office operations for mortgage brokers and finance firms — giving business owners freedom to focus on growth while ensuring compliance and efficiency.
editorNotes: If you are ready to outsource your Credit Analyst work to an organisation that takes data safety and security seriously, Proowrx are your outsourcing support team partners. With the core credit team being based in India and head office based in Sydney each member goes through rigorous training and support before jumping on a call with a Broker
name: Prooworx

description: Bula Outsourcing connects growing businesses with high-quality offshore staff across admin, operations, sales, and support while handling recruitment, onboarding, payroll, and compliance.
editorNotes: One of our client's used Bula and we thoroughly enjoyed working alongside with them. They have a Fiji based team which is a little bit different to typical outsourcing locations. Great at Servicing and Loan Processing, they also bring some fun vibes too.
name: Bula Outsourcing

description: We've had opportunity to help very-large organizations and much smaller companies with their cybersecurity-engineering challenges and cybersecurity situations. Protecting organisations who have teams offshore in the Philippines and around the world.
editorNotes: Threat Patrols is who you call when you want a thorough cybersecurity operations system. They are not your IT hotline, but highly experience experts in data security for businesses using internal and offshore management services.
name: Threats Patrol

description: MBJ Technologies is an Australian-based technology services company specialising in managed IT, cybersecurity, cloud solutions, and business systems support. They help growing businesses stay secure, connected, and productive with tailored IT strategies, proactive monitoring, and responsive support. From networking and data protection to Microsoft 365 and cloud infrastructure, MBJ Technologies partners with organisations to streamline technology, reduce risk, and support scalable growth with reliable, people-first service.
editorNotes: One of the most responsive and reliable IT Support teams we've worked. The coolest part of working alongside them is how passionate Mitch and the team are about ensuring Brokers don't pay for extra tools especially as Microsoft has bunch of *free* inbuilt tools such as Bookings (Calendly alternative) , Power Automate (Zapier alternative) and Planner (Trello alternative)
tagline: IT support you can count on

bio:
Simba is the Head of Service & Delivery at Broker Tools, overseeing timelines, cadence, and documentation (with the occasional nap, usually scheduled during important meetings). Known for his strict walk-time enforcement — and even stricter treat compliance — Simba ensures work gets finished because his time is precious. 

While he doesn’t understand what a CRM does (that’s his mother’s job), he does understand that without enforced play, walk, and rest schedules, everything quickly goes off the rails. His role is simple: to balance work with play.
name: Simba — Head of Service & Delivery
